h2text: Man must explore, and this is exploration at its greatest
h3text: Problems look mighty small from 150 miles up

h2text: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.

h2text: Science has not yet mastered prophecy
h3text: We predict too much for the next year and yet far too little for the next ten.
